item.title: The Irishman (2019)
item.description: ![](images/Main image.jpg) Directed by: Martin Scorsese Produced by: Martin Scorsese, Robert De Niro, Jane Rosenthal, Emma Tillinger Koskoff, Irwin Winkler, Gerald Chamales, Gastón Pavlovich, Randall Emmett, Gabriele Israilovici Screenplay by: Steven Zaillian Based on book: “I Heard You Paint Houses” by Charles Brandt Starring: Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, Joe Pesci Small title I left my mark here with a brush. Even smaller Brush is clean. Cleaning it again.

item.title: Moj drugi post
item.description: Ovdje je svašta samo nije ono što treba biti. Nadamo se boljem, ali očito nikad nije. Nemoj tu krivo biti.

item.title: About
item.description: A blog dedicated to all movies/series lovers who want to know more about historical and geographical context of the particular movie or series.
